item.title: Creedence Clearwater Revival - Who'll Stop The Rain - Key of G - DrJillReese
item.description: Play along video for the song Who'll Stop The Rain by Creedence Clearwater Revival from the channel DrJillReese. Chords used in the song: Am, Bm7, C, D, D7, Em, G.

item.title: Creedence Clearwater Revival - Up Around The Bend - Key of D - Grace Doebler
item.description: Play along video for the song Up Around The Bend by Creedence Clearwater Revival from the channel Grace Doebler. Chords used in the song: A, A7, D, G.

item.title: Creedence Clearwater Revival - Bad Moon Rising - Key of D - DrJillReese
item.description: Play along video for the song Bad Moon Rising by Creedence Clearwater Revival from the channel DrJillReese. Chords used in the song: A, D, G.

item.title: Creedence Clearwater Revival - Down On The Corner - Key of C - Dr. A
item.description: Play along video for the song Down On The Corner by Creedence Clearwater Revival from the channel Dr. A. Chords used in the song: C, F, G.
